title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.42 - Operation of illegal vehicles prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.42 - Operation of illegal vehicles prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall operate an automotive vehicle in a
truck terminal unless such vehicle may be legally operated on the public
highways in the State in which a truck terminal is located. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
